item.title: Udacity JS Courses
item.description:
Some interesting free courses for near future.

Intermediate:

  • Object-Oriented JavaScript by Hack Reactor
    Build a variety of JavaScript objects and explore how their inheritance models affect your app’s in-memory model. Gain simplicity and modularity in your own code.

  • Web Tooling & Automation by Google
    In this course, youâ€™ll learn how to setup your development environment and save a lot of time and effort with automatic optimization.

Advanced:

  • JavaScript Promises
    Learn how to simplify asynchronous work with Native JavaScript Promises!

  • JavaScript Design Patterns
    Learn the importance of code organization and how to implement it with either vanilla JavaScript or an organizational library or framework.

  • Front End Frameworks by Google
    Learn how to build Single Page Applications in various Front End Frameworks! In this course, you’ll learn how to create both an Angular application and an Ember app from scratch.
